about_the_game:
DAVE THE DIVER Digital Extra

Discover DAVE THE DIVER's unique boat skin, art book, and soundtrack with the Digital Extra Expansion Pack. This DLC is an expansion pack only available to those who already own the DAVE THE DIVER Basic Package.

Boat Skin

Customize Cobra's boat with unique boat skin.

Go to the 'Boat Skin' menu of the 'Diver Box (Inventory)' on Cobra's boat to find the available unlocked boat skin.

Art book

Discover more about DAVE THE DIVER through the digital artbook with design concepts and stories behind the scenes.

The digital art book contains concept art, backgrounds, pixel art and more. It comes in PDF format in the following directory.
Steam\steamapps\common\Dave the Diver\DAVE THE DIVER ArtBook

Soundtrack

Let the soundtrack of Dave the Diver remind of your exploration in the Blue Hole (54 soundtracks in total). The tracklist is available in English only.

Check the mp3 audio files in the following directory.
Steam\steamapps\common\Dave the Diver\DAVE THE DIVER soundtrack

Discover DAVE THE DIVER's unique boat skin, art book, and soundtrack with the Digital Extra Expansion Pack. This DLC is an expansion pack only available to those who already own the DAVE THE DIVER Basic Package.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Quad Core 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15
  • Processor: M1 Octa Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 800 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 / AMD Radeon HD 5570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 - i7 Quad Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750Ti / AMD Radeon R9 270x
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
